title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks      We have three traveling trunks that teachers can borrow to use in their classroom for interactive guided learning activities. These trunks contain recreated artifacts, pottery, period clothing, tools, toys and musical instruments. By interacting and learning through hands on activities your students can investigate multicultural significance of everyday items. This helps connect students with people of the past through mutual understanding. We cannot mail the trunks. The have to be picked up and dropped off in person. The trunks can be borrowed for 1-3 weeks please call at least one week in advance before picking up the trunks. For any questions or to schedule a field trip call (478) 752-8257 between 9:00am-5:00pm daily           Results  There are no results to show.
